name: FNF X Boxy Demo
description:
FNF X BOXY Is a mod that im still working on, one song has already been launched so this is the demo. The corrupted boxy character btw was inspired by Learning With Pibby.
CONTROLS
ARROW KEYS FOR UP DOWN LEFT RIGHT
MOBILE : RAINBOW SCREEN FOR ARROWS

RUNS ON ANYTHING THAT CAN USE A HTML5 FILE!
BUT FREEPLAY IS BROKEN! THERE IS A DELAY WITH THE CONTROLS BY THE WAY.
